DOC.detailed_description: Two six week surgery , patient newly diagnose glioblastoma multiforme ( GBM ) undergo six-week course radiotherapy concurrent chemotherapy ( temozolomide ) . Between three seven week complete radiotherapy/chemotherapy , patient undergo leukapheresis collect white blood cell . These cell grow dendritic cell , culture tumor cell individual patient . Vaccinations give every two week total three vaccination . Four week third vaccination patient resume chemotherapy one year disease progression .
